languages.text: "Это — гордыня, Арджента. Ты будто бы не хотела делиться своим открытием".
"Your actions were driven by hubris, Argenta. It's as if you wanted to keep your discovery all to yourself."
languages.original_text: "Это — гордыня, Арджента. Ты будто бы не хотела делиться своим открытием".

traits.locale_text: "Your actions were dictated by hubris, Argenta. It's as if you wanted to keep your discovery all to yourself."
"Your actions were dictated by hubris, Argenta. It's as if you wanted to keep your discovery all to yourself."
"Your actions were driven by hubris, Argenta. It's as if you wanted to keep your discovery all to yourself."
"Your actions were driven by hubris, Argenta. It's as if you wanted to keep your discovery all to yourself."
"Your actions were driven by hubris, Argenta. It's as if you wanted to keep your discovery all to yourself."

languages.text: “你的行为是受傲慢驱使的，阿洁塔。在我看来，你就像是要独吞所有发现一样。”
languages.original_text: "Your actions were driven by hubris, Argenta. It's as if you wanted to keep your discovery all to yourself."

traits.locale_text: “你的行为是受傲慢驱使的，阿洁塔。在我看来，你就像是要独吞所有发现一样。”

languages.text: «Sus acciones fueron guiadas por la arrogancia, Argenta. Es como si quisiera quedarse el descubrimiento usted sola».
languages.original_text: "Your actions were driven by hubris, Argenta. It's as if you wanted to keep your discovery all to yourself."

traits.locale_text: «Sus acciones fueron guiadas por la arrogancia, Argenta. Es como si quisiera quedarse el descubrimiento usted sola».

languages.text: 「アルジェンタ、お前の行動は思い上がりも甚だしい。まるで己の発見を独り占めしたかったかのようだ」
languages.original_text: "Your actions were driven by hubris, Argenta. It's as if you wanted to keep your discovery all to yourself."

traits.locale_text: 「アルジェンタ、お前の行動は思い上がりも甚だしい。まるで己の発見を独り占めしたかったかのようだ」

languages.text: "Euer Handeln war anmaßend, Argenta. Ihr wolltet Eure Entdeckung ganz für Euch alleine behalten."
languages.original_text: "Your actions were driven by hubris, Argenta. It's as if you wanted to keep your discovery all to yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Handeln war anmaßend, Argenta. Ihr wolltet Eure Entdeckung ganz für Euch alleine behalten."

languages.text: « J'ai plutôt l'impression que vous étiez guidée par l'orgueil et que vous vouliez garder cette découverte pour vous seule. »
languages.original_text: "Your actions were driven by hubris, Argenta. It's as if you wanted to keep your discovery all to yourself."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai plutôt l'impression que vous étiez guidée par l'orgueil et que vous vouliez garder cette découverte pour vous seule. »

languages.text: "Kibirle hareket etmişsin Argenta. Anlattıklarına bakılırsa bu keşfi, tamamen kendine mal etmek istemişsin."
languages.original_text: "Your actions were driven by hubris, Argenta. It's as if you wanted to keep your discovery all to yourself."

traits.locale_text: "Kibirle hareket etmişsin Argenta. Anlattıklarına bakılırsa bu keşfi, tamamen kendine mal etmek istemişsin."
